src: «Actualmente, tenemos ratones de cuatro meses de edad que antes solían ser diabéticos y que ya no lo son», agregó.
mt: "Currently, we have four-month-old mice that used to be diabetic and are no longer," he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: La investigación todavía se ubica en su etapa inicial, conforme indicara el Dr. Ehud Ur, docente en la carrera de medicina de la Universidad de Dalhousie, en Halifax, Nueva Escocia, y director del departamento clínico y científico de la Asociación Canadiense de Diabetes.
mt: The research is still in its early stages, as indicated by Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor in the medical school at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and director of the clinical and scientific department of the Canadian Diabetes Association.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Al igual que otros especialistas, es escéptico acerca de si la diabetes tiene cura y remarca que estos descubrimientos no son relevantes para quienes que ya padecen de diabetes de tipo 1.
mt: Like other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes has a cure and notes that these findings are not relevant to those who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: El lunes, Sara Danius, secretaria permanente del Comité por el Nobel de Literatura de la Academia Sueca, declaró públicamente en un programa radiofónico de Sveriges, en Suecia, que, al no poder contactar directamente con Bob Dylan para comunicarle el premio en Literatura 2016, el comité había abandonado sus esfuerzos por comunicarse con él.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Committee for Literature, publicly announced on a Swedish radio program that, after being unable to directly contact Bob Dylan to inform him of the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, the committee had given up on trying to contact him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius declaró: «Actualmente no estamos haciendo nada. Llamé y envié correos electrónicos a su asistente más cercano y recibí contestaciones muy cordiales. Por el momento, eso es sin dudas suficiente».
mt: Danius said: "We're not doing anything at the moment. I called and emailed his closest assistant and got very cordial replies. That's definitely enough for now."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Con anterioridad, el director ejecutivo de Ring, Jamie Siminoff, mencionó que la compañía había iniciado a raíz de que el timbre de su entrada no podía oírse desde la tienda que tenía montada en su garaje.
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff mentioned the company was founded after the doorbell at his garage store could not be heard from the store.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Él dijo que construyó un timbre wifi.
mt: He said he built a wifi doorbell.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff declaró que las ventas se dispararon luego de su aparición en un episodio de Shark Tank en el año 2013, en el que el panel del programa televisivo se negó a financiar la puesta en marcha de la compañía.
mt: Siminoff said sales skyrocketed after her appearance on a 2013 episode of Shark Tank, in which the show's panel rejected funding for the company's launch.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Hacia fines del año 2017, Siminoff hizo una aparición en el canal de compras televisadas QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff made an appearance on the shopping channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring también llegó a un acuerdo en el litigio con la compañía de seguridad de la competencia, ADT Corporation.
mt: Ring also reached a settlement in the lawsuit with the competitor's security company, ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Al día de hoy no se ha demostrado a ciencia cierta que algún fármaco sea adecuado para tratar la infección existente causada por ébola, aun cuando existe una vacuna experimental que pareciera ser capaz de disminuir la mortalidad causada por esa enfermedad.
mt: As of today, no drug has been proven to be effective in treating the existing infection caused by Ebola, even though there is an experimental vaccine that seems to be able to reduce the mortality caused by that disease.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Zmapp, un combinado de anticuerpos, tuvo un prometedor resultado de campo al principio, pero estudios los formales demostraron que era menos beneficioso de lo que se esperaba para prevenir la muerte.
mt: ZMapp, a combination of antibodies, had a promising field result at first, but formal studies showed it was less beneficial than expected in preventing death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: En el ensayo PALM, la función de Zmapp fue de control, es decir, que los científicos lo utilizaron como base y compararon con él los otros tres tratamientos.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp was the control, meaning that scientists used it as a baseline and compared it to the other three treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: USA Gymnastics respalda la nota del Comité Olímpico de los Estados Unidos y reconoce que resulta imperioso que la familia olímpica fomente un entorno seguro para todos nuestros deportistas.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports the statement of the United States Olympic Committee and recognizes that it is imperative that the Olympic family fosters a safe environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Coincidimos con la declaración de la USOC de que los intereses de los atletas, los clubes y sus deportes, pueden ser atendidos más apropiadamente si se avanza con cambios significativos dentro de nuestra organización, en lugar del retiro de las certificaciones.
mt: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of athletes, clubs and their sports can be better served by advancing significant changes within our organization, rather than the withdrawal of certifications.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA Gymnastics respalda a una investigación independiente que puede esclarecer de qué modo el abuso de la proporción que los sobrevivientes de Larry Nassa describieron con tanto coraje pudo haber pasado sin ser visto por tanto tiempo y acepta cualquier cambio necesario y adecuado.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shed light on how the abuse described with such courage by Larry Nassar's survivors could have gone on for so long without being seen and accepts any necessary and appropriate changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: La meta de USA Gymnastics y USOC es la misma: lograr que la gimnasia y otros deportes sean lo más seguro posible para que los atletas persigan sus sueños en un entorno protegido, positivo y potenciado.
mt: USA Gymnastics and USOC's goal is the same: to make gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible so athletes can pursue their dreams in a protected, positive and empowered environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Durante los años 60, Brzezinski trabajó para John F. Kennedy en el puesto de asesor y, posteriormente, para el gobierno de Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: During the 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as an advisor and later for the government of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Asesoró a Carter en materia de política exterior en las elecciones de 1976. Posteriormente, trabajó como asesor de seguridad nacional (ASN) entre 1977 y 1981, luego de Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976 Carter campaign foreign policy advisor. Subsequently, he served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, after Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Como consejero de seguridad nacional, asistió a Carter en el manejo diplomático de asuntos internacionales, como los Acuerdos de Camp David de 1978, la normalización de las relaciones entre Estados Unidos y China a fines de la década de 1970, la Revolución iraní de 1979, la que llevó a una crisis de rehenes en Irán, y la invasión soviética en Afganistán, en 1979.
mt: As National Security Advisor, he assisted Carter in the diplomatic management of international affairs, such as the Camp David Accords of 1978, the normalization of relations between the United States and China at the end of the 1970s, the Iranian Revolution of 1979, which led to a hostage crisis in Iran, and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: El filme, protagonizado por Tyan Gosling y Emma Stone, fue nominado en todas las categorías más importantes.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated in all the major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling y Stone fueron nominados como Mejor Actor y Mejor Actriz, respectivamente.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Best Actress, respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Entre las demás nominaciones se encuentran Mejor película, Mejor director, Mejor cinematografía, Mejor diseño de vestuario, Mejor edición de películas, Mejor partitura original, Mejor diseño de producción, Mejor edición de sonido, Mejor mezcla de sonido y Mejor guion original.
mt: Other nominations include Best Picture, Best Director, Best Cinematography, Best Costume Design, Best Film Editing, Best Original Score, Best Production Design, Best Sound Editing, Best Sound Mixing and Best Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Fueron dos las nominadas a mejor canción original: Audición (Los tontos que sueñan) y Ciudad de estrellas. El estudio Lionsgate fue nominado 26 veces, superando a cualquier otro estudio.
mt: 2 of the nominees for best original song were Audition (The Private Life of the Gob) and City of Stars. Lionsgate was nominated 26 times, surpassing any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: El domingo por la noche, en un anuncio realizado mediante el secretario de prensa, el presidente de los Estados Unidos de América, Donald Trump, comunicó que las tropas estadounidenses se retirarían de Siria.
mt: On Sunday night, in a statement made through the press secretary, the President of the United States of America, Donald Trump, announced that U.S. troops would be withdrawn from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: El anuncio se hizo tras la conversación telefónica que Trump mantuvo con con el presidente de Turquía, Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: The announcement came after a phone call between Trump and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turquía asumiría, además, la vigilancia de los militantes del ISIS que fueron capturados, a quienes las naciones europeas, conforme indica el comunicado, les denegó su repatriación.
mt: Turkey would also take charge of monitoring ISIS militants who were captured, whom European nations, as the statement indicates, denied repatriation.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Además de confirmar que al menos algunos dinosaurios eran plumíferos, una teoría ya generalizada, también ofrece datos específicos que los fósiles por lo general no ofrecen, como su color y su estructura tridimensional.
mt: In addition to confirming that at least some dinosaurs were feathered, a theory already widely accepted, it also offers specific details that fossils generally do not, such as their color and three-dimensional structure.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Según los especialistas, este animal tiene un plumaje de color castaño en la zona superior y una tonalidad pálida o carotenoide en la parte de abajo.
mt: According to experts, this animal has a brownish upper plumage and a pale or carotenoid coloration on the underside.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Asimismo, el hallazgo permite comprender mejor la evolución de las plumas de las aves.
mt: The discovery also helps to better understand the evolution of bird feathers.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Dado que el plumaje de los dinosaurios no tiene un eje bien desarrollado, denominado raquis, pero sí presenta otros rasgos de las plumas (cerdas y bárbulas), los investigadores llegaron a la conclusión de que es probable que el raquis sea el resultado de un desarrollo evolutivo posterior de estas otras características.
mt: Because the dinosaur feathers lack a well-developed shaft, called the rachis, but do have other features of feathers (barbs and barbules), the researchers concluded that the rachis is likely a later evolutionary development of these other features.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: La estructura que presenta el plumaje sugiere que su función no estaba relacionada con el vuelo, sino que las usaban para regular la temperatura o como indicador de la misma. Los investigadores sostienen que, aunque se trata de la cola de un dinosaurio joven, la muestra analizada presenta rasgos del plumaje de un adulto y no de un polluelo.
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests that their function was not related to flight, but that they were used to regulate temperature or as an indicator of the same. Researchers say, although it is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample analyzed has features of the plumage of an adult and not of a chick.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Las apreciaciones de los expertos fueron que, aun cuando se trata de la cola de un dinosaurio de corta edad, la muestra ilustra más el plumaje de un adulto que el de un polluelo.
mt: Experts' opinions were that, although it is the tail of a young dinosaur, the specimen illustrates more the plumage of an adult than that of a chick.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: En la mañana de ayer, en Gaziantep, Turquía, un coche bomba mató a dos oficiales de policía e hirió a más de otras veinte personas.
mt: Yesterday morning in Gaziantep, Turkey, a car bomb killed two police officers and injured more than twenty others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Desde el gobierno informaron que diecinueve de las personas heridas eran policías.
mt: 19 of the injured were police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: La policía informó que el sospechoso por el ataque es un supuesto militante de Daish (ELIL).
mt: Police say the suspect in the attack is a suspected Daish (ISIL) militant.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Se descubrió que el sol se regía por los mismos principios básicos que otras estrellas: los únicos factores que impulsaban su actividad dentro del sistema eran su luminosidad y su rotación.
mt: It was discovered that the sun was governed by the same basic principles as other stars: the only factors driving its activity within the system were its luminosity and its rotation.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: La intensidad de la luz y la rotación se combinan para calcular el número de Rossby de una estrella, vinculado al flujo de plasma.
mt: The intensity of the light and the rotation are combined to calculate the Rossby number of a star, linked to the plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: A menor número de Rossby, menor es la actividad de la estrella en relación con sus inversiones magnéticas.
mt: A lower Rossby number, the lower the star's activity in relation to its magnetic inversions.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Iwasaki debió enfrentarse con numerosos problemas durante su viaje.
mt: Iwasaki had to face numerous problems during his trip.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Lo asaltaron piratas, lo mordió un perro con rabia en el Tíbet, escapó del matrimonio en Nepal y lo detuvo la policía en India.
mt: It was attacked by pirates, bitten by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped from a marriage in Nepal and arrested by police in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: El 802.11n estándar funciona tanto en frecuencias de 2.4Ghz como 5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n standard works in both 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Esto hará posible su compatibilidad con versiones anteriores de 802.11a, 802.11b y 802.11g; ello en la medida en que la estación base tenga radios duales.
mt: This will allow it to be compatible with previous versions of 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g; to the extent that the base station has dual radios.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Las velocidades del estándar 802.11n son mucho más altas que las alcanzadas por los que lo precedieron, con un rendimiento teórico máximo de 600 Mbps.
mt: 802.11n speeds are much higher than those achieved by its predecessors, with a theoretical maximum throughput of 600 Mbps.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, que está casado y tiene dos hijos adultos, no causó una buena impresión a Miller, que fue a quien le relató la historia.
mt: Duvall, who is married and has two adult children, did not make a good impression on Miller, who was the one to whom he told the story.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Al pedirle un comentario, Miller dijo: «Mike habla mucho durante la audiencia… Estaba preparándome, así que en verdad no pude escuchar lo que decía».
mt: When asked for comment, Miller said: "Mike talks a lot during the hearing… I was getting ready, so I really couldn't hear what he was saying."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: «Trabajaremos duro para reducir el nivel de dióxido de carbono emitido por unidad de PIB para el año 2020, de modo que la diferencia sea significativa en comparación con el 2005», afirmó Hu.
mt: «We will work hard to reduce the level of carbon dioxide emitted per unit of GDP by 2020, so that the difference will be significant compared to 2005», Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: No mencionó una cifra para los recortes y manifestó que se harán en base a la producción económica de China.
mt: He did not mention a figure for the cuts and said they would be based on China's economic output.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu incentivó a los estados en vías de desarrollo a «no volver al tradicional camino de contaminar primero y hacer limpieza después».
mt: Hu encouraged developing countries to “not return to the traditional path of first polluting and then cleaning up”.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Agregó: «Aun así, no es correcto exigirles que asuman obligaciones que sobrepasan su fase de desarrollo, su nivel de responsabilidad y sus capacidades».
mt: He added: "It is not right to expect them to take on responsibilities that exceed their stage of development, their level of responsibility and their capabilities."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: El Grupo de Estudio de Irak elevó hoy su informe a las 12:00 GMT.
mt: The Iraq Study Group released its report at 12:00 GMT.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Advierte que nadie puede dar garantías de que alguna acción iraquí en este punto detendrá la lucha sectaria, la creciente violencia o una inclinación hacia el caos.
mt: He warns that no one can guarantee that any Iraqi action at this point will stop sectarian strife, growing violence or a slide toward chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: El informe comienza con un llamado a debate abierto y a formar un consenso en los Estados Unidos acerca de las políticas sobre el Oriente Medio.
mt: The report begins with a call for open debate and consensus in the United States on Middle East policies.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: El informe es sumamente crítico con prácticamente cada aspecto de la política vigente del poder ejecutivo en Irak, y apela a un cambio inmediato de dirección.
mt: The report is highly critical of virtually every aspect of the current executive policy in Iraq, and calls for an immediate change of direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Contiene 78 recomendaciones, de las cuales la número uno es la adopción de una nueva iniciativa antes del final del año con el propósito de proteger las fronteras de Irak de operaciones hostiles y para restaurar los vínculos diplomáticos con sus vecinos.
mt: 78 recommendations, with number one being the adoption of a new initiative before the end of the year to protect Iraq's borders from hostile operations and to restore diplomatic ties with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, quien a la fecha ocupa el cargo de senadora y es la primera dama de la República Argentina, anunció anoche en La Plata, ciudad ubicada a 50 kilómetros (31 millas) de Buenos Aires, que se postulará para la presidencia.
mt: Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, who currently holds the position of senator and is the first lady of the Argentine Republic, announced last night in La Plata, a city located 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires, that she will run for president.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: El Teatro Argentino fue el lugar donde la señora Kirchner anunció su intención de candidatearse como presidenta; este es el mismo sitio donde inició su campaña para el senado en el año 2005, en representación de la provincia de Buenos Aires.
mt: The Teatro Argentino was the place where Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president; this is the same site where she began her campaign for the senate in 2005, representing the province of Buenos Aires.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: La cuestión que dio origen al debate fue la controversia en torno al presupuesto destinado al socorro y reconstrucción posteriores al huracán Katrina, medida que algunos conservadores fiscales etiquetaron en torno de broma como el «Acuerdo de Nueva Orleans de Bush».
mt: The issue that sparked the debate was the controversy surrounding the budget for post-hurricane Katrina relief and reconstruction, which some fiscal conservatives jokingly labeled the "New Orleans Agreement of Bush".
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Las críticas de los liberales en relación a los trabajos de restauración tienen su foco en el hecho de que se han adjudicado contratos de reconstrucción a personas que, al parecer, son funcionarios de Washington.
mt: Liberal critics of the restoration projects have focused on the fact that reconstruction contracts have been awarded to people who, apparently, are Washington officials.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Más de cuatro millones de individuos se concentraron en Roma para presenciar el funeral.
mt: 4 million people gathered in Rome to witness the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Fue tanta la cantidad de gente que se concentró, que no todos pudieron acceder al funeral en la Plaza de San Pedro.
mt: So many people gathered that not everyone could access the funeral at St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Se instalaron de grandes pantallas de televisión en diferentes puntos de Roma, para que todos pudieran ver la ceremonia.
mt: Large television screens were set up in different points of Rome, so that everyone could see the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: En muchas otras ciudades italianas, así como en todo el mundo, en particular en Polonia, se llevaron a cabo montajes parecidos que vieron muchísimas personas.
mt: In many other Italian cities, as well as around the world, particularly in Poland, similar rallies were held that saw many people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Los historiadores critican las políticas pasadas del FBI por concentrar sus recursos en casos de fácil resolución, en especial los de automóviles robados, con la intención de mejorar su tasa de éxito.
mt: Historians criticize the FBI's past policies of focusing its resources on easy-to-solve cases, especially stolen cars, in an effort to improve its success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: En el año fiscal 2005, el Congreso inició la financiación de la campaña contra la obscenidad y dio la instrucción de que el FBI debe asignar 10 agentes a ocuparse de la pornografía para adultos.
mt: In the fiscal year 2005, Congress initiated funding for the obscenity campaign and instructed the FBI to assign 10 agents to handle adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa obtuvo la mayor puntuación en entradas: 70 anotaciones con solo 41 bolas, al conectar 11 cuatros y 2 seises.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest score in innings: 70 runs off 41 balls, hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: El rendimiento tanto de Sachin Tendulkar como de Rahul Dravid, bateadores de orden medio, fue bueno y lograron una asociación de cien anotaciones.
mt: The performance of both Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, middle-order batsmen, was good and they put on a century stand.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Mas, luego de quedar sin el wicket del capitán, India solo logró 36 carreras y 7 de sus wickets fueron derribados para finalizar las vueltas.
mt: Mas, after losing the wicket of the captain, India only scored 36 runs and 7 of their wickets were knocked down to finish the innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: El primer mandatario de EE. UU., George W. Bush, llegó a Singapur temprano el 16 de noviembre, dando inicio a una gira de siete días por Asia.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore early on November 16, kicking off a seven-day tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Le dio la bienvenida el vice primer ministro de Singapur, Wong Kan Seng, y debatió asuntos comerciales y de terrorismo con jefe de estado, Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: He was welcomed by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng, and discussed trade and terrorism issues with President Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Luego de una semana de derrotas en elecciones de medio mandato, Bush dio un discurso a la audiencia sobre la expansión comercial en el continente asiático.
mt: After a week of midterm election defeats, Bush gave a speech to the audience on commercial expansion in the Asian continent.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Stephen Harper, primer ministro, acordó enviar la Ley de Aire Limpio del gobierno para su revisión a un comité donde participan todos los partidos antes de la segunda lectura, y después de la reunión de 25 minutos en la PMO del martes con Jack Layton, líder del NDP.
mt: Stephen Harper, prime minister, agreed to send the government's Clean Air Act to a committee where all parties participate before second reading, and after a 25-minute meeting at the PMO on Tuesday with Jack Layton, NDP leader.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Durante la reunión llevada a cabo con el primer ministro, Layton había solicitado que se introdujeran cambios en la ley ambiental de los conservadores, apelando a una «modificación exhaustiva y completa de su redacción».
mt: During the meeting with the prime minister, Layton had asked for changes to the Conservative Party's environmental law, appealing for a "complete and thorough revision of its wording".
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Desde que el gobierno federal intervino y asumió la financiación del hospital Mersey, en Davenport, Tasmania, las autoridades estatales y algunos miembros del parlamento federal tacharon tal medida de engañosa, con miras en las elecciones federales, que tendrán lugar en el mes de noviembre.
mt: Since the federal government intervened and took over the funding of the Mersey Hospital in Davenport, Tasmania, state authorities and some members of the federal parliament have called such a measure deceptive, with an eye on the federal elections, which will take place in November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Sin embargo, el primer ministro John Howard afirmó que el único objetivo de la ley fue proteger las instalaciones del hospital de la degradación por parte del gobierno de Tasmania, al otorgar 45 millones de dólares australianos adicionales.
mt: However, Prime Minister John Howard said the only purpose of the law was to protect the hospital's facilities from degradation by the Tasmanian government, by providing an additional 45 million Australian dollars.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Conforme surge del último informe, las lecturas del nivel del mar señalan la formación de un tsunami y se detectó cierta actividad de este fenómeno en las cercanías de Pago Pago y Niue.
mt: As the latest report emerges, sea level readings indicate the formation of a tsunami and some activity of this phenomenon was detected near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: No se han informado mayores daños o heridos en Tonga, pero se interrumpió el servicio de electricidad de forma temporal, lo que, se supone, frustró la recepción por las autoridades tonganas de la advertencia de tsunami emitida por el PTWC.
mt: No reports of damage or injuries in Tonga, but the power was briefly interrupted, which is believed to have prevented the Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Catorce escuelas en la costa de Hawái o en el área cercana a ella cerraron completamente el miércoles, a pesar de que se levantaron las advertencias.
mt: 14 schools on Hawaii's coast or in the surrounding area closed completely on Wednesday, despite the lifting of the warnings.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: George W. Bush, presidente de los Estados Unidos, recibió con gusto el anuncio.
mt: George W. Bush, President of the United States, welcomed the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Gordon Johndroe, vocero de Bush, se refirió al compromiso norcoreano como «un avance importante hacia el objetivo de alcanzar la desnuclearización constatable de la península de Corea».
mt: Gordon Johndroe, a Bush spokesman, referred to the North Korean commitment as "an important step toward the goal of verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: El día de hoy se originó en el Océano Atlántico la tormenta número diez de su temporada de huracanes en ser nombrada, a la que se denominó Tormenta subtropical Jerry.
mt: Today, the tenth tropical storm of the season was named, and was named Subtropical Storm Jerry.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: El Centro Nacional de Huracanes (CNH) declaró que por ahora está previsto que Jerry toque el suelo.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) declared that for now it is expected that Jerry will make landfall.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Según estimaciones realizadas por el Cuerpo de Ingenieros de los Estados Unidos, hasta 6 pulgadas de lluvia podrían filtrarse por los diques anteriormente dañados.
mt: According to estimates made by the United States Corps of Engineers, up to 6 inches of rain could seep through the previously damaged levees.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Debido al desborde del dique que está cerca del Noveno Distrito, el agua llega hasta la cintura actualmente en ese lugar, que ya había sufrido inundaciones de hasta 20 pies a causa del huracán Katrina.
mt: Due to the breach of the levee near the Ninth Ward, the water is currently up to the waist in that area, which had already suffered flooding of up to 20 feet due to Hurricane Katrina.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: El agua fluye encima del dique en un tramo que tiene un ancho de 100 pies.
mt: Water flows over the dam in a 100-foot-wide section.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Adam Cuerden, administrador de Commons, expresó su frustración por las eliminaciones en una declaración que hizo a Wikinwes el mes pasado.
mt: Commons administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions in a statement he made to Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: «En esencia, él [Wales] nos mintió desde un comienzo. Por un lado, pretendiendo que lo hacía por rezones legales. Por el otro, fingiendo prestarnos atención hasta el momento en que eliminaba el contenido artístico».
mt: «In essence, he [Wales] lied to us from the start. On one hand, pretending to do it for legal reasons. On the other, pretending to pay attention until he removed the artistic content».
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: El enojo de la comunidad condujo a los esfuerzos actuales por redactar una política sobre el contenido sexual del sitio, que hospeda a millones de medios con licencia abierta.
mt: Community anger led to current efforts to draft a policy on the site's sexual content, which hosts millions of licensed media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Si bien se trató de un trabajo eminentemente teórico, el programa se redactó con la finalidad de simular las observaciones realizadas a la galaxia de Sagitario.
mt: While it was a largely theoretical work, the program was written with the intention of simulating observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Serían las fuerzas de marea entre la materia oscura presente en la galaxia y la de la Vía Láctea lo que provocaría el efecto esperado por el grupo de científicos.
mt: It would be the gravitational forces between the dark matter present in the galaxy and that of the Milky Way that would cause the expected effect by the group of scientists.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: La Vía Láctea influeye en la galaxia de Sagitario del mismo modo en que la luna ejerce una fuerza de atracción sobre nuestro planeta y causa las mareas.
mt: The Milky Way exerts a gravitational pull on the Sagittarius galaxy in the same way that the moon exerts a force of attraction on our planet and causes the tides.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Los expertos llegaron a la conclusión de que las materias oscuras se afectan entre sí al igual que lo hace la materia regular.
mt: Experts concluded that dark matter interacts with itself in the same way as regular matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Esta teoría sostiene que la mayor parte de la materia oscura que rodea a una galaxia se sitúa en torno a esta en una clase de halo y se compone por numerosas partículas pequeñas.
mt: This theory holds that most of the dark matter surrounding a galaxy is situated around it in a halo and is composed of numerous small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: En las coberturas televisivas puede verse humo blanco emanando de la planta.
mt: In the television coverage, white smoke can be seen emanating from the plant.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: El gobierno local advierte a quienes residen en las cercanías de la planta que no salgan de sus hogares, mantengan apagados los aires acondicionados y no consuman agua del grifo.
mt: The local government warns those living near the plant not to leave their homes, keep air conditioners off, and not to drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Según ha informado la agencia nuclear de Japón, se ha encontrado cesio y iodo radioactivos en la planta.
mt: According to the Japanese nuclear agency, radioactive cesium and iodine have been found at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Según especulaciones de las autoridades, todo indica que los contenedores del lugar que tienen combustible de uranio podrían haberse roto y tener pérdidas.
mt: According to speculation by authorities, it appears that the containers at the site that have uranium fuel may have been broken and have leaks.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: La tuberculosis extremadamente resistente (XDR-TB) fue detectada por primera vez por el Dr. Tony Moll en área sudafricana de Zululandia.
mt: Extremely drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) was first detected by Dr. Tony Moll in the South African Zululand area.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Durante una entrevista, señaló que la nueva variante generaba «mucha preocupación y alarma, dada su elevada tasa de mortalidad».
mt: During an interview, he noted that the new variant generated "a lot of concern and alarm, given its high mortality rate."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: El doctor Moll cree que algunos pacientes podrían haber contraído el virus dentro del hospital y que al menos dos de los infectados eran trabajadores de salud de ese nosocomio.
mt: Dr. Moll believes some patients may have contracted the virus within the hospital and at least two of the infected were health workers from that facility.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
